pipeline.name: Phase 1: Wide Scan
pipeline.description: 28 explicit searches across BTC, AI, agent economy, space, emerging tech
pipeline.instructions: Execute 28 web searches across all categories. For each search: save title, URL, 2-sentence summary, relevance score (1-10). Group by category. Save raw results to memory/daily-scan/YYYY-MM-DD-phase1-raw.md. Target: 25-30 minutes total.

pipeline.name: Phase 2: Deep Dives
pipeline.description: Reads Phase 1, ranks signals, does 3-5 deep dives with full articles
pipeline.instructions: Read Phase 1 raw file. Rank all signals by: (1) relevance to axioms, (2) actionability, (3) time-sensitivity. Pick top 3-5 signals. For each: fetch full article, extract key data, write 150-300 word analysis. Save final report to memory/daily-scan/YYYY-MM-DD.md.
